author: silviodonato
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a copy of #31907 after having removed commits
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31907/commits/7884c359200bc3b0996f7503b110afa4f946be7c (Backport of #31730)
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31907/commits/02d8281f16dad355fd0623c3da11a92edc289743 (Backport of #32021)

The purpose of this PR is the review of  #31907
title: [DO NOT MERGE - TEST ONLY] Remove  #31730 and  #32021 from #31907
